item.description:
Learn about the Enneagram 9 types with Herb acting out the 9 types, learning your type, growth and development for your type and how to relate to each of the 9 types effectively.

 

Herb Pearce, Enneagram personality types expert, is the author of 3 books and a therapist who uses the Enneagram in his work with individuals, couples and families and with organizations.

www.herbpearce.com, 617 794 7213 cell, herb@herbpearce.com

You can only register by a phone call. Please do not show up without calling me first. Anyone who signs up and doesn't show up or cancel in advance is automatically banned from membership!

Cost $35, refreshments served.
item.how_to_find_us: Just past Arlington Center next to Dunkin Donuts and near Walgreens
item.name: Enneagram Basic Workshop
